languages.text: {n}Даже не двигаясь с места, сестра Арджента излучает энергию. С сиянием в темных глазах и легким румянцем на щеках она читает молитву, и обращает взгляд к вам, только произнеся последнюю строчку:{/n} "{name}, приветствую!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Даже не двигаясь с места, сестра Арджента излучает энергию. С сиянием в темных глазах и легким румянцем на щеках она читает молитву, и обращает взгляд к вам, только произнеся последнюю строчку:{/n} "{name}, приветствую!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Even in stillness, Sister Argenta radiates energy. With her dark eyes shining and a slight blush to her cheeks, she is reciting a prayer, and looks at you only once she has spoken the final line.{/n} "{name}, greetings!"
languages.original_text: {n}Даже не двигаясь с места, сестра Арджента излучает энергию. С сиянием в темных глазах и легким румянцем на щеках она читает молитву, и обращает взгляд к вам, только произнеся последнюю строчку:{/n} "{name}, приветствую!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Even unmoving, Sister Argenta radiates energy. With her dark eyes shining and a slight blush to her cheeks, she is reciting a prayer and only turns her gaze to you when she's finished with the final line.{/n} "{name}, greetings!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Even unmoving, Sister Argenta radiates energy. With her dark eyes shining and a slight blush to her cheeks, she is reciting a prayer and only turns her gaze to you when she's finished with the final line.{/n} "{name}, greetings!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Even in stillness, Sister Argenta radiates energy. With her dark eyes shining and a slight blush to her cheeks, she is reciting a prayer, and only turns her gaze to you when she finishes the final line.{/n} "{name}, greetings!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Even in stillness, Sister Argenta radiates energy. With her dark eyes shining and a slight blush to her cheeks, she is reciting a prayer, and only turns her gaze to you when she finishes the final line.{/n} "{name}, greetings!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Even in stillness, Sister Argenta radiates energy. With her dark eyes shining and a slight blush to her cheeks, she is reciting a prayer, and looks at you only once she has spoken the final line.{/n} "{name}, greetings!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔即便一动不动，她的周身也在散发着能量。她的黑眼睛闪闪发光，脸颊微微泛红。她正在唱诵祷文，祷告完毕之后才转向你。{/n}“向你致意，{name}！”
languages.original_text: {n}Even in stillness, Sister Argenta radiates energy. With her dark eyes shining and a slight blush to her cheeks, she is reciting a prayer, and looks at you only once she has spoken the final line.{/n} "{name}, greetings!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔即便一动不动，她的周身也在散发着能量。她的黑眼睛闪闪发光，脸颊微微泛红。她正在唱诵祷文，祷告完毕之后才转向你。{/n}“向你致意，{name}！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Even in stillness, Sister Argenta radiates energy. With her dark eyes shining and a slight blush to her cheeks, she is reciting a prayer, and looks at you only once she has spoken the final line.{/n} ", greetings!"

languages.text: {n}Incluso en su sosiego, la hermana Argenta desprende energía. Sus ojos oscuros brillan y sus mejillas se sonrojan ligeramente. Recita una plegaria y, cuando termina, por fin se digna a mirarte.{/n} «¡Saludos, {name}!».
languages.original_text: {n}Even in stillness, Sister Argenta radiates energy. With her dark eyes shining and a slight blush to her cheeks, she is reciting a prayer, and looks at you only once she has spoken the final line.{/n} "{name}, greetings!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Incluso en su sosiego, la hermana Argenta desprende energía. Sus ojos oscuros brillan y sus mejillas se sonrojan ligeramente. Recita una plegaria y, cuando termina, por fin se digna a mirarte.{/n} «¡Saludos, {name}!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}静寂の中でも、シスター・アルジェンタは活力をみなぎらせている。黒い瞳を輝かせ、頬を少し赤らめながら、彼女は祈りを唱えている。 最後の一節を唱える時に、彼女はあなたをわずかにみやる。{/n}「{name}、ごきげんよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Even in stillness, Sister Argenta radiates energy. With her dark eyes shining and a slight blush to her cheeks, she is reciting a prayer, and looks at you only once she has spoken the final line.{/n} "{name}, greetings!"

traits.locale_text: {n}静寂の中でも、シスター・アルジェンタは活力をみなぎらせている。黒い瞳を輝かせ、頬を少し赤らめながら、彼女は祈りを唱えている。 最後の一節を唱える時に、彼女はあなたをわずかにみやる。{/n}「{name}、ごきげんよう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Selbst in völliger Reglosigkeit strahlt Schwester Argenta Energie aus. Mit glänzenden Augen und einer leichten Röte auf den Wangen rezitiert sie ein Gebet und blickt dich erst an, nachdem die letzten Worte verklungen sind.{/n} "{name}, seid gegrüßt!"
languages.original_text: {n}Even in stillness, Sister Argenta radiates energy. With her dark eyes shining and a slight blush to her cheeks, she is reciting a prayer, and looks at you only once she has spoken the final line.{/n} "{name}, greetings!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Selbst in völliger Reglosigkeit strahlt Schwester Argenta Energie aus. Mit glänzenden Augen und einer leichten Röte auf den Wangen rezitiert sie ein Gebet und blickt dich erst an, nachdem die letzten Worte verklungen sind.{/n} "{name}, seid gegrüßt!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Même dans toute sa raideur, Sœur Argenta irradie d'énergie. Avec ses yeux sombres brillants et un léger rose sur ses joues, elle récite une prière et ne lève les yeux vers vous qu'à la fin de celle-ci.{/n} « {name}, salutations ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Even in stillness, Sister Argenta radiates energy. With her dark eyes shining and a slight blush to her cheeks, she is reciting a prayer, and looks at you only once she has spoken the final line.{/n} "{name}, greetings!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Même dans toute sa raideur, Sœur Argenta irradie d'énergie. Avec ses yeux sombres brillants et un léger rose sur ses joues, elle récite une prière et ne lève les yeux vers vous qu'à la fin de celle-ci.{/n} « {name}, salutations ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Rahibe Argenta, durduğu yerde bile etrafına enerji yayıyor. Bir dua okurken kara gözleri parlayıp yanakları hafiften allanıyor. Duasını bitirdiğinde sana bakıyor.{/n} "Selam {name}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Even in stillness, Sister Argenta radiates energy. With her dark eyes shining and a slight blush to her cheeks, she is reciting a prayer, and looks at you only once she has spoken the final line.{/n} "{name}, greetings!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Rahibe Argenta, durduğu yerde bile etrafına enerji saçıyor. Kara gözleri parlayıp yanakları hafiften allanırken bir dua okuyor. Ancak duasını bitirdiğinde sana bakıyor.{/n} "Selam {name}!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
